attributes.action: introduce legislation to change the law to make it illegal for any police officer or community support officer, on discovering a person who is an illegal immigrant, to release that person and if they do punishment is to be immediate termination of employment and loss of all pension rights.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our once proud country is overcrowded and being degraded.  When illegal immigrants are discovered they should immediately be deported.  Police officers and community support officers SHOULD NOT have any latitude over how these people are dealt with and should be aware that they will lose their jobs and their pensions if they do not detain and deport the individiual.
